job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: stronguJob SummarybrbrustrongAt Workiva we want a diverse mix of talented engineers who are product builders If you dont want to settle for just doing the ticket and if you want to be empowered to change the product to solve customer problems youll love it here The technologies you know beforehand or the technologies you leverage while solving problems matter less than making software that real people enjoy usingbrbrWere an agile team committed to maintaining a positive safe supportive and results driven team culture We routinely work on improving performance user efficiency and user experience in the application Workiva uses a tight feedback loop with customers to reprioritize work accordingly in an Agile development process Were committed to solving real customer problems and use this feedback loop to ensure were delighting them with our solutionsbrbrThe team routinely works fullstack The frontend is a web application leveraging Dart HTML5 and CSS The backend services are in Python Java and Kotlin and deployed in a Cloud environment using Kubernetes and Amazon AWS The technology is a detail  we are confident that engineers can and will learnbrbrWorkiva wants every team and individual to have autonomy and ownership over their teams deployment production monitoring and architecture We facilitate this by helping individuals grow over time in expertise and with opportunities to lead Since engineers collaborate with the rest of Workivas teams to build a cohesive product leadership and communication skills lead to growth and opportunity herebrbrstronguWhat Youll DobrustrongulliContribute to team projects and deliver individual level technical solutionsliliPerform Code Reviews within your teams products or componentsliliTest software and write automated tests unit integration functional etcliliDebug components within your service or application contextliliAnalyze data to assess and understand solutions developed by your teamliliEstimate your own work with guidanceliliWrite and document code with clearly defined requirementsliliCommunicate individual work to your team and diverse technical audiencesliliAssist in triaging and resolving production issuesliliMay participate in product discovery activities with customers and stakeholdersliliMay participate in the hiring processbrliulstronguSkillsbrbrustrongstrongWhat Youll NeedbrstrongulliDemonstrated proficiency in programming to include a solid foundation in computer science with competencies in one or more of data structures algorithms objectoriented software design and working with cloudbased distributed systemsliliExperience working in modern programming languages such as Dart JavaScript Go Java Kotlin Python or CliliSome experience debugging systems or applicationsliliExperience using one or more commercial databasesliliFamiliarity with one or more of the following areas Amazon Web Services Google Cloud Platform relational databases REST and other modern web protocols andor Mobile computingliliFamiliarity building one or more of unit integration functional user acceptance or contract testsliliExperience working in an agile development environment preferredliliExperience developing for service oriented architecture is a plusliliExperience with Docker or other container systems is a plusliliExperience with active or passive monitoring is a plusbrliulEducationbrulliBS in CSSEEECErelated field or equivalent experiencebrliulTravel RequirementsbrulliUp to 10 travelbrliulWorking Conditions amp Physical RequirementsbrulliMay require afterhours support to resolve critical customer issuesbrliulstronguHow Youll Be RewardedbrustrongulliBase Pay Range in Colorado 86000  125000liliA discretionary bonus typically paid annuallyliliRestricted Stock Units granted at time of hirebrliulThe base pay range represents the low and high end of the hiring range for this job Actual pay will vary and may be above or below the range based on various factors including but not limited to relevant skills experience and capabilitiesbrbrstrongstrongWhere Youll WorkbrbrstrongstrongOur values drive how we work and who we hire You will see these values ingrained in how we support our customers work with team members build our products and in the work environment weve createdbrulliCustomer Success Always delight our customersliliTrust Rely on each other liliIntegrity Do the right thing every time liliCollaboration Share resources and work together liliInnovation Keep creating solutions and finding better ways liliInclusion Support a diverse community where we all belong liliAccountability Be responsible for your success and failurebrliulWe believe our people are our greatest asset and our unique culture gives employees the opportunity to make an impact everyday We give our employees the freedom and resources they needbacked by our culture of collaboration and diverse thoughtto continue innovating and breaking new ground We hire talented people with a wide range of skills and experiences who are eager to tackle some of todays most challenging problemsbrbrstronguAt Workiva Youll EnjoybrustrongulliFantastic Benefits With coverage starting day one choose from competitive health dental and vision plans on the largest physician networks availableliliCasual Dress Workiva has
